trans-unit.source: The incident ID references customer support cases or SAP internal incidents.

seg-source.mrk: The incident ID references customer support cases or SAP internal incidents.

target.mrk: 事件 ID 會參考客戶支援案例或 SAP 內部事件。

trans-unit.source: For the <uicontrol>Customer Support</uicontrol> access category, the incident ID references customer support cases that document the purpose of SAP support user access to customer systems. These cases can be reviewed by customers in customer service management.

seg-source.mrk: For the <uicontrol>Customer Support</uicontrol> access category, the incident ID references customer support cases that document the purpose of SAP support user access to customer systems.
These cases can be reviewed by customers in customer service management.

target.mrk: 針對 <uicontrol>[客戶支援]</uicontrol> 存取種類，事件 ID 會參考客戶支援案例，其中記錄 SAP 支援使用者存取客戶系統的目的。
客戶可在客戶服務管理審查這些案例。

trans-unit.source: For the <uicontrol>Heath Check Support </uicontrol> access category, the incident ID references SAP internal incidents raised by automatic health checks. These incidents are not visible to customers.

seg-source.mrk: For the <uicontrol>Heath Check Support </uicontrol> access category, the incident ID references SAP internal incidents raised by automatic health checks.
These incidents are not visible to customers.

target.mrk: 針對 <uicontrol>[健康檢查支援]</uicontrol> 存取種類，事件 ID 會參考透過自動健康檢查提出的 SAP 內部事件。
系統不會對客戶顯示這類事件。

trans-unit.source: The incident ID is empty for SAP support user access with the <uicontrol>Operations</uicontrol> access category. Access of this category is not based on individual support cases or incidents.

seg-source.mrk: The incident ID is empty for SAP support user access with the <uicontrol>Operations</uicontrol> access category.
Access of this category is not based on individual support cases or incidents.

target.mrk: 透過 <uicontrol>[作業存取]</uicontrol> 種類進行存取的 SAP 支援使用者，其事件 ID 為空白。
此種類的存取不是根據個別支援案例或事件。
